description: Explore Zed Run, a pioneering platform that combines horse racing with blockchain technology and NFTs. Discover how it has successfully indie hacked the digital racetrack through community involvement, innovative economic models, and leveraging blockchain for secure transactions.
keywords: Zed Run, indie hacking, NFTs, blockchain, digital horse racing, Ethereum, digital ownership, virtual gaming, community engagement, decentralized assets
title: Zed Run: A Case Study in Indie Hacking the Digital Racetrack
